name: Space Charge
description:
Hi there, welcome to my entry for the Bullet Hell game jam, the theme was "10 Seconds" and I made Space Charge, a sci-fi, space, side-scrolling, shoot-em-up arcade title where you need to 'charge' your energy for a total of 10 seconds in order to release a barrage of bullets in order to clear the wave, but while you charge you are unable to move, also you start with 3 'protective shields', once you use them all you will be vulnerable, no worries tho because the enemies can drop them if you are lucky. This game is inspired by the retro shoot-em-up games from the 90s so I naturally made the aspect ration of 4:3 and a score system.  

Thank you for checking out my game, I hope you will like it and  good luck to everyone else that participated on this Jam!!!
